website_summaries.verdict: These are a solid choice when looking for durable bulbs that have a vintage appeal, but may not be the best choice for those who use the dimmable feature often.
pros: These are consistently liked for their beautiful bright light and attractive appeal that works with a variety of decor themes, from rustic to industrial
They stand out for offering a good amount of light and being high quality for the price
cons: Users sometimes reported a discernible buzzing noise when using the dimmer
Some felt the light was too bright

customer_reviews.title: Form meets function in these bright (but not too bright) Edison bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: These are literally the best Edison bulbs out there if you’re looking for ones that can actually brighten up a space without burning up your retinas when you look straight at them. I got these for an open light fixture that hangs over my small dining table, and they are perfect: they cast a good amount of light while adding some vintage farmhouse charm to an otherwise very modern space. These lights also arrived in perfect condition, with each individual bulb cushioned by bubble wrap and in its own mini box within a larger box (see photos).
customer_reviews.author: Life of Becky

customer_reviews.title: Best Edison bulbs I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: **important edit** I've got a real time electricity monitor, and it turns out that these lights are closer to 90w. That explains why they're so bright - but they're not 60w as advertised. Caveat emptor! Holy cow, thankfully these are dimmable! Best Edison bulbs I've ever purchased. Bright as bright can be, and luckily we've got them on a dimmer switch - they're easily 5-10x as bright as the bulbs we previously had in there.
customer_reviews.author: Nick in AZTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Not Dimmable - Will Buzz and Hum on Dimmer Switch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bulbs, very bright, which was great for my purpose but falsely advertised as dimmable. My electrician tested two different dimmer switches and they buzz and hum terribly. Some people seem to be quite, ahem, hard of hearing but they do buzz. We switched brands and the buzzing was instantly gone. If you can't hear or it doesn't bother you, go for it; otherwise, they are not compatible with dimmer switches. They WILL dim but for me the buzzing was intolerable, a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Beaufort12

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Quality and Dependability
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with these bulbs and am happy with my purchase. I was having trouble finding a nice product that could operate on a two-stage security lamps on our home; I wanted something that looked elegant, was able to provide a soft light on the dimmed stage, and bright enough to illuminate the driveway, porch and surrounding area when the motion sensor was tripped. I was initially worried about the projected life of the bulb (3,000 hours), so I purchased the 6-pack in September 2016. I'm still on the first two bulbs -- these have worked flawlessly from dusk to dawn for nearly two years.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Hot bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuff to replace the ugly brass chandelier that was hanging in our dining room. Bought a 2"x8" piece of lumber from Homedepot,cut it to 14" long, drilled three holes in a triangle and screwed it to the ceiling. I do wish I had bought the LED version of the bulbs, but these work for now... These get sooo hot, but they are gorgeous. With the extra socket/cage/bulb, I was also able to make a light for my back door with some plumbing pipe and another piece of the 2"x8". So, I made two light fixtures for under $80.
customer_reviews.author: Danferd

customer_reviews.title: each happily buzzing away
customer_reviews.text: Well made bulbs, with clear glass and unusually high lumen output, 370, unfortunately won't work for our home. We use 5 of these bulbs in a hanging light over our table. Sometimes we need bright light, sometimes we need atmosphere, so we use these on a dimmer. But each of these bulbs buzzes noticeably the lower the light level gets. With 5 bulbs overhead, each happily buzzing away, they can't create enough atmosphere to see/hear past the annoying din. Tried on a linear z-wave dimmer switch and Lutron Maestro. Really wanted these to work!
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs! Love the old timey look. Keeps you warm during winter! Runs very warm, especially in a small room... I have 10 bulbs (2 in 2 lamps and 8 in a ceiling light fixture) in a 12x10 bedroom you can feel a significant temperature change when you have them on for sometime. Right now it doesn’t bother me as we are going into winter but during the summer it might become a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Reynna

customer_reviews.title: 4 of these are as bright as 2 of the regular bulbs
customer_reviews.text: This is about what I expected as far as brightness. It is suitable. I wanted to use every socket in the lighting fixture, while not overpowering the room with light, and thought these would add a nice touch over getting 4 lower watt globe bulbs. This product looses a star because one of the bulbs came broken. I am going to ask the company to replace the broken bulbs. I will come back and update this review after I see how that process goes!
customer_reviews.author: The Suburban Experimentalist

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like these...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packages and they each came with several broken bulbs. I was able to salvage enough to have one box of six and I used them and one of them blew up and broke in my light fixture..I ended up returning the broken ones and requesting a refund for the one that blew up and the ones I took out because I was afraid to use them and have them catch my house on fire!
customer_reviews.author: crobles1127

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Edison bulbs to use in some reproduction pendant lights. They look great! And the most impressive thing to me is how long they last! I have been using them for well over a year (probably closer to over 2 years) and have not replaced a single bulb!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful look
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful but they are not as bright as a standard 60W bulb. They give off a soft golden glow and are beautiful but not crisp white like LED. Perfect for the lights we put them in. They do get warm like standard bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Darla K.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY APPLICATION
customer_reviews.text: These light bulbs were perfect for my application. I renovated a vintage light fixture for my dining room. I wanted a light bulb that would compliment the fixture yet throw enough light to see at the dinner table. Check out the lumens (370) and compare to other brands of this type. It is much brighter. I put a dimmer switch on it so when I want mood lighting I can have that too. At full power they are bright white and at lesser power they glow a warm yellow. PERFECT! ps Delivered on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: patriot

customer_reviews.title: Look great, using for about a year and still going...
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting, nice looking bulbs. I made a mason jar light set for our kitchen /sink area. These are big bulbs and required the wide mouth quart jars. We keep these on overnight (using a dimmer) in a group of 3 bulbs; works well as a nice night light. When at max brightness, you can feel the heat radiating. Bright enough to see well for washing dishes. Still using the 1st 3 bulbs for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: TravMan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: These were boxed well, sturdy, and minimally. I appreciated the lack of excess packaging and the fact that most of it can easily be recycled. The product itself is durable, beautiful, and gives a good amount of light without blinding you if you look at it. Will buy again once these burn out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Turned black after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I Don’t recommend these at all. I purchased them and I am past the return window but 2 have turned completely black! I’ve had them less than 2 months They also run VERY hot. They really add heat to the room and make the light fixture hot to touch. Save your money and invest in a little higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best bulb of this type!!!!!! Company is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing light bulbs and the company is even Better!!!! These are durable but delicate for shipping. One of my bulbs was broken and they immediately sent me a new one with one simple email. And they last a long time! They have the perfect brightness with the old antique look. Unlike other bulbs like this that have a gross yellow glow and are too dull. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: gale bergers

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These light bulbs are stunningly bright. We bought them for our bathroom light fixtures and they are near blinding... in a good way! My husband was worried that they would be too dim for our bathrooms but we were pleasantly surprised. We have had these bulbs for approximately 6 months and have not had any issues. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Lights glass get burnt out in short time
customer_reviews.text: we use this on a light over our dinning table and they are only used for an hour or two a day. After just a few months of use half of them are all blacked out inside. I'm guessing its from the heat because they are very hot. Out of the 13 bulbs we're using, 8 of them look like the example in my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: JFroz

customer_reviews.title: Good product but super bright
customer_reviews.text: Good product but super bright! Maybe I misread but these aren't the nicely dim lit Edison bulbs you see in your local coffee shop. Unless you place them in a high place or use them in an art-like studio, you may find them too bright for exposed usage. I have them covered with a lampshade for my bedside.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One of the set blew after just a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: One of the set blew after just a couple of months in a dusk to Dawn outdoor fixture. Luckily I only needed 5. The rest have been successful and look awesome. Taking off 1 star for the blown bulb.
customer_reviews.author: jasenjude

customer_reviews.title: NOT TOO YELLOW
customer_reviews.text: WHO DOESN'T LOVE EDDISON BULBS, AND THIS ONE IS THE CLOSEST TO A SOFT WHITE LIGHT BULB YOU CAN GET. I DON'T LIKE HOW YELLOW THEY USUALLY ARE. THIS ONE IS PERFECT. HAVE ORDERED SEVERAL BOXES FOR FRIENDS & THEY LIKE THESE FAR BETTER THAN OTHER MANUFACTURES.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: bright enough for practical use but turning black
customer_reviews.text: These were great. Bright enough for our kitchen table area. We have a 4-bulb chandelier, and it gives off enough light for practical use. Also, they aren’t too warm. Overall, they’re pretty bright for this style. However, after less than two months of use, two of the bulbs have turned black. It’s not noticeable when the lights are on, but it is when they’re off.
customer_reviews.author: ErinD

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Just right, and these are bright, with a warm (not harsh) glow. They came well packaged and none were broken. I was truly surprised. I'm here to order another round, since I have some new light fixtures that need more. :)
customer_reviews.author: mcoffeesnob

customer_reviews.title: Vintage orange or bright white! !
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are great. I have them in a fixture over my dining table on a dimmer switch. I can have the soft orange vintage glow when they are dimmed or bright white light when they are not. None of mine were broken. It seems that recently Amazon is double boxing everything which really helps with dsmage. Very pleased with this purchadr
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but hums with dimmer switch
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are beautiful and look fantastic in our new industrial cage lighting. However, I will be returning because of the awful buzz/humming on the dimmer switch. Beautiful to look at, but not practical for our home. Really bummed they are advertised as dimmable - technically true, but so annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Lindys

customer_reviews.title: Longevity was over 3 years
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we have bought these in 3 years. So the reason I say that is because one bulb lasted that long - 3 years and we use them every day... so we are very grateful for the quality of these bulbs
customer_reviews.author: ymipaul

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several sets of bulbs from local hardware store. All of the bulbs were either too dim or created shadows on my walls. At a last resort, I ordered these and love them. They are bright, dimmable, and attractive. I attached a photo, but you can't see the Edison look filament. The filament does show and it enhances my new gloves.
customer_reviews.author: S J Baker

customer_reviews.title: Way too orangey
customer_reviews.text: I hated these blubs, they are extremely warm to the point of being orange. Not attractive at all in my opinion. They work well and I am sure the quality is fine, just not the color I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Not LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: An electrician informed me these are not actually LED bulbs. Work great and look great. Large bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Tedford

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and brightness of these bulbs. They give off A LOT of heat, though I presume that I can use a dimmer to tone them down as needed. One bulb did break as soon as I energized it; the glass rod simply collapsed. We'll see how well the others hold up. Would have given them a five rating if one had not broken so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Man

customer_reviews.title: One didn't work
customer_reviews.text: They look nice with my fixtures but 1 out of the 6 bulbs does not work. I needed exactly 6 bulbs to fit my fixtures and now I'll either have to re-order or return them and go with a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Marian T Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm mood lighting
customer_reviews.text: Very cool vintage looking lightbulbs that give a nice warm light. I'm so sick of my husband buying the "latest and greatest" lightbulb technology that gives off terribly bright, bad lighting. I no longer feel like I'm in the dentists chair when I walk into my bedroom! These bulbs look cool too so be sure to get a fixture where the bulb can be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Summer H.

customer_reviews.title: I love the yellow glow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pennant hanging light for my dining room to go over my table. My light has 3 light bulbs and provides plenty of light. My light has an opening at the base of the light, so I can see these beautiful light bulbs. Orginally my dining room light calls for a white plastic covering to be used on the bottom opening. I elected to keep the covering off so I could enjoy the light bulbs and the light looks better without the white covering.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: one of the six bulbs was bad, otherwise - beautiful
customer_reviews.text: One out of the 6 bulbs was no good. Otherwise, the bulbs are great and work well with out dimmers. To truly show the edison aspect of them, we keep the dimmer low. Then you can see the individual strands, otherwise it's so bright it just looks like one uniformed light.
customer_reviews.author: O’Neill

customer_reviews.title: Attractive bulbs, but they run HOT
customer_reviews.text: These are very attractive vintage style bulbs, appear as advertised. However they generate a lot of heat. We tried them in light fixtures mounted to the sides of our bathroom vanity mirror. Standing in front of the vanity 2-3 feet away I felt blasted with heat. We are opting for LED bulbs instead.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great, at first
customer_reviews.text: After about 4 months of use, the glass started to get smokey colored. The glass is now so dark gray on the outside that even though they still turn on, they hardly give off any light. The center bulb in the second photo is new. The others are about 6 months old. They just keep getting darker.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bella

customer_reviews.title: The bulbs are actually very nice. Nice that is if you can get a ...
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are actually very nice. Nice that is if you can get a full order without any broken bulbs. Placed an order a while back that arrived fine. Needed some extras to replace burned out bulbs. Have ordered 2 times and had to return both due to broken bulbs. Amazon is doing a very poor job of packaging these for shipping. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: mf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about the longevity since I've only had them for about 2 weeks now but I'm going to order another box because they're awesome looking
customer_reviews.author: Dawne Belloise

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dim
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bulb with an amber but bright enough light. I am giving only 3 stars because it wouldn't dim using my dimmer switch
customer_reviews.author: -LifeOfSomeKind

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs
customer_reviews.text: All the bulbs came packaged well and none broken or "deformed" like some of the other reviews I read. Dimmable, not very bright, more for ornamental purposes I would say. Clear bulbs but give off more of a yellowish hued light.Haven't heard any noise coming from mine like I read in one of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are BRIGHT! They definitely put out some great lighting. So they definitely surpassed my expectations in that department. I was a little disappointed that they weren’t as “Edison bulby?” And by that I mean they weren’t as dim and the inside isn’t what your traditional Edison bulbs would look like I guess. BUT they are great especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Too bright for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are super bright. I purchased them to use in a 4 bulb fixture above my bathroom mirror and they were way too bright to use. You couldn't look into mirror without squinting. The bulbs, however are very beautiful and gave the retro look I was hoping for. I just had to return for a lower wattage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: What’s up with the bulbs that turn black/cloudy inside?
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these bulbs twice - have 6 in a dining room fixture and 3 in pendants over my island. I like them...but one has turned smoky/black on the inside. It still lights up...but looks terrible. I remember reading this problem when I read reviews before purchase. Of course it happens after the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Malbers

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. However
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of the 4 bulbs were defective. One of the bulbs screwed in lopsided and the other one did not screw in. Very disappointed. However, the 2 that did work had nice white light brightness.
customer_reviews.author: drphyllis

customer_reviews.title: Needed light to read and write by and these work.
customer_reviews.text: Installed new lights in our home and initially bought Edison bulbs that have amber light - didn't work for us. Replaced those bulbs with the clear bulbs and now we now have adequate light to work by.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for bathroom light fixtures. Great bulb! Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Valeri

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Design
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our new light fixture! Much better value on Amazon rather than at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: HIPam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - nice upper star shadow cast
customer_reviews.text: I think these are pretty nice bulbs. They give off a nice warm light and they cast a rather nice star like shadow up on the ceiling above them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Shine Bright Like A Diamond
customer_reviews.text: I love these bulbs. Perfect touch to the lighting decor in my home. They are more on a dim scale but enough to see and move around. Easy to screw into objects. Long lasting. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful! I had to return them because I accidentally got the wrong ones, but these were great looking!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Goss

customer_reviews.title: I think the contractor provided the wrong size to begin with and these now really pull our pendant lights over our kitchen bar t
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described with very fast shipping. The bulbs they replaced were quite small compared to these vintage Edison Bulbs. I think the contractor provided the wrong size to begin with and these now really pull our pendant lights over our kitchen bar top together nicely. They provide ample lighting for the area and of course marry up nicely with our rustic fixtures. I used three of the six and the all worked great, no issues. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Look awful after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the bulbs create a smoke/dirty appearance on the inside after having them installed for 6 months. It’s like they are coated with charcoal on the inside. I ordered new ones thinking it was just a bad batch but it happened again. I really like the brightness and appearance of the bulbs when initially installed in both our kitchen and bathroom light fixtures. I’m disappointed I need to find something different. I wish I knew what caused this?
customer_reviews.author: KReview

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. They look great in my dining room’s chandelier. They are dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: Deeflaca

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Overall I Love these lights! This is the second time ordering. Great value!!! I was sad to see we had 2 broken this time. One was completely shattered and one wouldn’t work. Thankfully I ordered 2 sets this time.
customer_reviews.author: Talburt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: The light bulbs themselves are very nice. They are bright and look great. I ordered 2 - 6 packs for the new light fixtures I bought and they work great. The only issue I had was that one of the bulbs was broken when I received the package. I kind of half assumed this may happen since we are talking about shipping light bulbs. I would give them 4 1/2 if I could. The picture I've attached does not give the brightness of the bulbs justice.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E Goeing

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today and these are the bulbs I've been looking for. I hate the amber colored bulbs so I was looking for clear ones. These are a great quality and has a great look! These are very bright as well. I will definitely buy again. Not sure of the longevity since I just got them, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brightness- not orange!
customer_reviews.text: These Edison Bulbs are fantastic! Packed individually they all came in tact and ready to go. They have the perfect vintage vibe without the orange tint. Dimmable feature is awesome. They screw into a standard light perfect! Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two boxes and love them in our bath, hallway and on a dimmer in our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: jennthirty

customer_reviews.title: Some bulbs won’t work — NOT recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not all the bulbs worked. Only some bulbs worked. Still trying to get vendor to respond and replace defective bulbs. I can’t recommend based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: P. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great, But Some Blacken Over Time
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are really nice and great quality. I noticed one of mine had turned black, but still worked. I guess the filament can deteriorate over time. I got two years out of this one. Since it's a clear glass light fixture, I swapped it out. Just a heads up in case anyone else experiences it. Not sure how long they are supposed to last overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaclea

customer_reviews.title: Burns extremely hot !
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these bulbs simply because they burn much too hot. I replaced them with the vintage LED and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute looking bulb
customer_reviews.text: They look great in a rag lamp shade at the top of the stairs. Adequate wattage.
customer_reviews.author: Lady in the Pink House

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, however I have these in the fixture ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, however I have these in the fixture above my dining table and you can feel the heat radiating off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Yellow
customer_reviews.text: Extremely yellow. Didn’t work in our white bathroom. I would have sent them back but my daughter drew on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Alright but expect damage
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered it, a bulb arrived broken. I was able to exchange it for new ones and overall they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 boxes, total of 18 bulbs. The amazon packaging seemed like it wasn't enough to prevent damage to the bulbs however they all worked. All bulbs were identical, so no problems with the manufacturer packaging either. Can't verify the quality this soon but they do look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wilshire

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful replacement bulbs. Bright and match my previous bulbs perfectly
customer_reviews.author: minpin08

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Package of 6 arrived quickly with all bulbs intact and working. They give off a soft light and are a safe alternative to the expensive and toxin-filled "green" florescents. These fit in standard light fixtures. They are especially useful for work and shop lighting as they make wood, leather, and other materials easier to color match.
customer_reviews.author: 1836Top Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: One bulb is defective.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bulbs. I've had them for 2 months, but when I opened the last one in the box, the metal end was bent. The electrician that put up my new light fixture said he could not use that bulb with the defect on the metal end. I need a refund or replacement for one bulb. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup lighting
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these bulbs to go along with light fixture that was also ordered via amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lirpa Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bulbs but one was damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs look great in the fixtures but 1 of the 6 bulbs was broken when I opened the package. It is not worth the hassle to return them. I’ll just have 2 spare bulbs instead of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rogles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute bulbs. Used with wire cage shades on the lights above bathroom vanity. Nice accent and seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a satisfied product. I put this in my bathroom and even from a great distance I can feel the heat like it was burning. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin D

customer_reviews.title: Throws a nice glow, bright as you will need for ambiance ...
customer_reviews.text: Throws a nice glow, bright as you will need for ambiance lighting. Perfect for burning up some kilowatts for when those tree-hugging hippies that come over to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: I do love these but they do not last long
customer_reviews.text: I had to lower my stars. I just had to order them again, came perfect. No broken bulbs. Made sure we didn’t touch them with our hands. We used new rubber gloves. And I already have had to replace two of them.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love the look.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I removed my current globes and added these for a farmhouse look above my table.
customer_reviews.author: Griffee3

customer_reviews.title: Love the packaging of these products
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging of these products, really cute and well done. The lights are very bright, so my only complaint is that I will need to order something with less lumens for the pendant lights above our bar top counter. Otherwise, these guys are perfect, just perhaps a bit too bright for the kitchen area
customer_reviews.author: BrittainyK

customer_reviews.title: DOA, no seller response
customer_reviews.text: One bulb does not work and the seller has not responded for a week now. I like the look of them, but if they cant produce a quality product and handle customer service it doesnt matter.
customer_reviews.author: SDot

customer_reviews.title: Need better shipping!
customer_reviews.text: On of them arrived broken- wanted a matching set for a light fixture. Very disaapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Returning but not because of problem
customer_reviews.text: Won't be keeping the moms though I like them very much because the fixture they were to go into is not going to work when we needed it. So I was making a return of both items.
customer_reviews.author: Bertina Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vintage style lightbulbs!
customer_reviews.text: These lightbulbs are beautiful!! They're exactly what I wanted for my chandelier where the lightbulbs are really important because of the vintage style. The chandelier I got them for is the "BAYCHEER HL371768 Industrial Retro Vintage style with 39.37 inch Length Chain Rope 6 Lights Chandelier Pendant Light Lamp use E26/27 Bulb" I'll definitely be re-purchasing these!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs, but they are loud on a dimmer
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these, but they do buzz quite loudly on a dimmer switch. These are installed in 2 different places with 2 types of dimmers and they all buzz. It does say in the description that they're dimmable otherwise I wouldn't have purchased. In my opinion they look best dimmed below 100% to get a nice glow, so this is an important factor that dropped the rating down to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Crites

customer_reviews.title: Never need anything else~
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my house and when I redo other houses. These are just perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Edison Lights
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to put in the Westinghouse 6343300 Iron Hill 4 Light Chandelier. They look perfect! They are plenty bright for the space in which we hung the light fixture. They arrived when promised and were packaged very well. I will buy them again!

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs have a great old school look. Went great with my clear pendant light over my kitchen sink. Brightness is very good. Has a yellowish tint different than led bulbs. Looks really nice.

customer_reviews.title: Coming back for more.
customer_reviews.text: The order was received quickly and all bulbs were packaged properly and work well. I make unusual lamps and I am very pleased with these 60W bulbs, though I should have ordered some that are about 25W. Think I'll do that now.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great light bulbs very very bright. I use 3 in my ceiling fan brightens up my whole dining room. Totally worth buying!

product_meta.title: Vintage Edison Bulbs, Rolay 60w Clear Glass Dimmable Vintage Edison Light Bulbs for Home Deco, 6 Pack
feature_bullets: PRETTY VINTAGE STYLE BULB: These 60w 370lumens Edison bulbs provides an antique appearance when on/off, perfectly preserve the look, feel and style of early 1900’s light bulb, boosting up any room's personality.
BEAUTIFUL WARM GLOW: These antique light bulbs gives off a warm glow when on and look great in any of your vintage style fixtures, add warm and cozy mood to your room!
FULLY DIMMABLE: These filament bulbs work perfectly with most dimmer switch. When dimmed them down to the lowest setting, you can really see the gorgeous squirrel cage filament all lit up!
ELEVATE YOUR HOME: These e26 edison bulbs will be the talk of any room in your home! Fits into either an E26 or E27 screw base, great for mood wall sconces, island light, chandelier and more.

Notice: If broken bulbs or defective bulbs happened, and you do not want to return them all. Please try to log into your Amazon seller account and find your order, then choose problem with order and tell us. We will ship free replacement bulbs to you or refund you according to your choice.
